title: What is the difference between Naturopathy and Ayurveda?
description: Answer (1 of 12): Ayruveda is an ancient Indian healing system. I don't know a whole lot about it, but it does have some things in common with naturopathy. The definition of naturopathy also probably varies around the world. I know in Australia a naturopath has a bachelor's degree, but in the ...
